website_summaries.verdict: Since they’ll need to give their new friend a scrub in the tub before seeing just how fuzzy and cute their Blossom Bunny is, these toys are extra fun for kids who love plushies.
pros: 3 Blossom Bunnies to find: mint, lemon, and peach
turns cute and fluffy after you give her a bath
Includes brush, flower crown, and adoption certificate
cons: You don’t know which bunny color you’re going to get

customer_reviews.title: They are cute,but took forever to be fluffy.
customer_reviews.text: We opened the package and nothing was wrong. We washed it with soap and water. After that we started the hairdryer. After about 10 minutes it was still wet. So we put it in the dryer for about an hour. The arms,ears,belly,and tail were still wet. So we let it air dry for a while. We checked on it after 20 minutes and it was still wet. Finally we used the hair dryer again and it finally dried. It had became fluffy and soft. But after a few days it was quite matted. I’m not sure this was worth $20... Probably worth 15 dollars. Shipping was quick though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Howard

customer_reviews.title: Scruff a Luv Bunny
customer_reviews.text: My daughter caught sight of this and HAD To have it, so I put in a good word and that good ole Easter Bunny scored her one. Obviously it hasn't yet been opened, so can't comment on the actual bunny, but I assume it should look like her Scruff a Luv Cat and Bunny she already has. Box was in decent condition. A little bend that kinda bothers me, but my 7 year old won't even notice. Hopefully it's the green one she wants, but I know she will love it no matter the color.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Nothing what I expected. The price is way too high. This was very disappointing. Like the washrags that grow in water. Had to dry in the dryer. Fur is horrible looking and hard to brush. So extremely disappointed. Don't buy unless you like disappointing you child.
customer_reviews.author: dediperk

customer_reviews.title: adorable fun for 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: very cute my daughter loved it because she saw them on TV this is her first one. she even signed its adoption certificate with this being her first year she could write her name. she already wants another animal like this one I think this one was the cutest one though.
customer_reviews.author: MamaB.

customer_reviews.title: We washed it twice and it’s still clumpy!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these. The first one my daughter tried to do herself and it didn’t turn out. The hair was still clumpy. So with this one, I helped her and we really washed this guy! But his hair was still clumpy. I tried rinsing it again and drying it and he’s still clumpy. I reread the directions and I had done what it said but it just didn’t really work that well. I gave it two stars because the concept is so cute! But the follow through isn’t the greatest...
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS FALSE ADVERTISEMENT.... Don 't throw $$ away
customer_reviews.text: Got for granddaughter. I’m embarrassed. We took it to her and I couldn’t believe what it was like! No one could tell what it was. I wouldn’t spend a penny on this!! Amazon needs to quit selling this, it’s pure junk. It looks like something found in the garbage. As a matter of fact, my daughter-in-law accidently threw it in the trash because it looked like a piece of trash. $20plus It should be criminal to sell sonething that I consider false advertizementof a product.
customer_reviews.author: tipperlee13

customer_reviews.title: Girls loved them
customer_reviews.text: These are a hoot! They come in a box and look like a sad, filthy egg. After washing them and scrubbing them, they become little "rescue" animals. The girls loved them. It would make a fun gift for a child who likes stuffed animals. We ended up ordering a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: brwn_eyed_sue

customer_reviews.title: Too much hassle, not enough fluffy reward.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful but I’m not a fan. You must really soak the stuffed animal to get all the starch out, then comb the hair, then dry - well, my daughter didn’t want to wait HOURs possibly DAYS for it to air dry. We tried using a hair dryer but it was just sopping wet, that also would’ve taken hours. My daughter gave up after 30 minutes of drying time. I threw the toy into the dryer. It came out looking like roadkill. I washed in the washing machine thinking maybe we didn’t get all the starch off of it.... it still looked rough. My daughter never plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Do not blind gift like on Easter
customer_reviews.text: Do not blind gift like on easter because one was missing it’s nose and my daughter was super upset. She didn’t want the Easter bunny rabbit to come back to swap it either because it was already abandoned once like in the story. But she is still disappointed because her two sisters didn’t have that problem. So I would never buy this as a surprise gift that you can’t easily exchange at a store.
customer_reviews.author: Batty13

customer_reviews.title: Paying more for the experience
customer_reviews.text: My daughter REALLY wanted this. I tried to talk her out of it, but she spent her own birthday money on it. As far as the value, the quality of the stuffed toy is terribly. In my opinion, it looks terrible even after you have "cleaned and brushed" it to beautify it. It still looks like a ratty old toy with compacted stuffing. That said, my daughter loved washing it and drying it and brushing it. She sleeps with it every night, too. The headband crown is pretty cute, too, and another daughter who has one wished hers had a crown.
customer_reviews.author: chinou2

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I got these on a “sale” price (75% off of regular price) because if I had paid full price it definitely wouldn’t be worth it. The drying time is ridiculous. Had to put it in dryer for 30 min & it still was wet. Continued to blow dry & brush to make it fluffy, which it did end up looking cute, but hair/fuzz gets EVERYWHERE. I ordered 2, one for each of my daughters & they each got a different color so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: hard to manage the hair
customer_reviews.text: First off my daughter loves these. She carries it everywhere. Which is the only reason I come back to grab more. There has to be a better way I'm hoping in the future maybe they can change the way you wash the animal so that they look better. I brushed one trying to fix the hair until hair started tearing away causing a hole in one of them. I don't love them but I buy them for the little one.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A little tedious but overall a win
customer_reviews.text: Super cute concept, my 4 year old daughter loved this. She took it in the bath with her and washed it out, and I spent about 45 minutes blow drying on low setting. End result was cute, fluffy, and fairly soft. I trimmed some of the fur to see the face better. Taking off a star because over about a month, this bunny is the rattiest looking stuffed animal she has and I’m constantly having to brush the hair out to keep it decent looking. She still loves it and sleeps with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Love

customer_reviews.title: My kids like it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit underwhelmed, but this review is not about me. The ball of fur that came out of the box had me questioning what in the hell I had bought. But, I kept telling myself I spent less than $15. Both my three year old son and my two year old daughter enjoyed bathing it (I just threw it in the tub with them!) and it dried surprisingly quick and turned out way cuter than I thought. My kids are both over the moon, which is what I was hoping for! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Multiple times I have "won the gifts" with this!
customer_reviews.text: I know there's "no competition" when giving gifts, but I've had mom's tell me multiple times that this gift was the favorite! As a mom, I don't get it, it comes out as a matted ball of yuck. But there's something about the maternal need to take something and help it grow, blossom, and become what it was meant to be- the little girls absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Best Gammy present ever !
customer_reviews.text: My little 8 yr old granddaughter LOVED IT !!!!! When you open the box the little bunny was in a matted ball of hard fur. Yuck , not sure about this I thought. Then we washed her with baby soap in the sink. Charley loves rubbing her fur . She came out wet and soggy but looked like a real bunny. We dried her and used the hair dryer on her and wow that bunny came to life.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted one of these. I thought it sounded cute enough. I wasn't impressed with how raggedy it looked after being wet and dried. It aged by 15 years once it got wet and I just would have rather skip it. At least the price was ok and at least she seems to find it desirable.
customer_reviews.author: MangoSunset

customer_reviews.title: Floppy bunny
customer_reviews.text: My little one absolutely had to have one of these pathetic creatures thanks to the heavy marketing on the Disney channel. It's cute, floppy, scruffy, and exactly the type of stuffy every kid loves. We had fun washing, squeezing, drying, and brushing this little guy. Would I buy another one? Probably not. The novelty wears off quick. When it's all said and done, it's a floppy bunny, but it made my kid happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lusreviews

customer_reviews.title: Great concept.
customer_reviews.text: The idea is very cute, but in reality its really flawed. No matter how much brushing you do, they just look like a mangled mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kateyes76

customer_reviews.title: Not a hot....creepy!
customer_reviews.text: Per some reviews I ordered this bunny for an Easter gift. My granddaughter was not too impressed even when I told her it would change after a bath. Her parents did follow the directions for wetting it and it was described to me as THE CREEPY CHUCKY BUNNY. Sadly, the creepy bunny was thrown in the trash. No more Chucky bunny nightmares!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: At least different from the others
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Limited Live Scruff-A-Luvs as well as all the other colors. In generally, I don't think these are any good as their fur sheds but my daughter said to give this Limited product 5 stars because it was at least different animal. The other 3 we got were all dogs.
customer_reviews.author: gilee

customer_reviews.title: Blow dryer highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is an interesting toy. Parents need to be willing to blow dry this toy for at least 30 minutes for it to boot come out looking like a homeless pet. My daughter loved opening it to find what she got and also loved washing her. I believe the instructions say you can put on the spin cycle in the washing machine and be done but I would still highly suggest blowing dry to get the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you can snag it on sale
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 4 yr old’s Easter basket. The box was quite large in size and decorated cute. My daughters followed the grooming instructions, but our critter didn’t fluff up very well like the stock photos. I even tried myself. It is still a cute stuffed animal and she loves it. If you can catch it on sale I’d say it’s worth the money. I don’t know if I’d buy another full price, though.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my grandsons. We tried to follow the directions but they never got fluffy. We now refer to them as road kill bunnies. The funny thing is, my one grandson age 2 still pulls it out of my toy box every time he comes over.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality toy
customer_reviews.text: So first of all, this is a cheap made toy... the washing part drys out your hands n leaves them feeling disgusting. The toy, after the water is expanding.. your toy, you soon realize that the fur n material it’s made from is the same as a dollar store toy. On top of all that u start to realize it’s not the funniest thing in the world cus it’s just high maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Coville

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES TAKE A PROFFESSIONALS WORk to make it look like its fluffy
customer_reviews.text: since this is a kid toy, i dont know if anyone can actually successfully make it as fluffy as it is in ads, drying process has to be very proffessional not for kids, but it is a toy for kid. so i am not recommending anyone who expects a nice toy at end. its onyl a toy to enjoy the process before end with disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Hardworking Man

customer_reviews.title: Overall not happy.
customer_reviews.text: My box was opened at one end and had a crunch in another place. That immediately made me skeptical. Looking into the box the "critter" is blue and not yellow which the picture showed. That's why I ordered that. The "critter" looks really matted and like it is second or third hand))-: Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hunsberger

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, we give as gifts
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and their friends do too, and Amazon has the best price. We got 2 and they were the same color though, but not sure if it was just a coincidence or not, you never really know with these mystery toys.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Great for Easter basket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter’s Easter basket. She loves it and loved the washing process. But scruffy is right! Even after the bath, blowing dry, and lots of brushing, it still looks like it needs a good blowout :) But super cute nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forever "scruff"
customer_reviews.text: The bunny is a super cute idea, and my daughter loves it. BUT even after washing it and blow drying it, it still looks abandoned ;).
customer_reviews.author: Julia L.

customer_reviews.title: Novelty wore off quickly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter thought this was a fun toy for a few hours, but once it was washed and dried it just turned into a low quality stuffed toy that she doesn't ever play with. Cute idea, but not sure it was worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son is infatuated with these and he was thrilled to receive this. They do start off looking pretty rough but I guess that is part of the appeal. I'm sure we will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: jason frazier

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bunny!!
customer_reviews.text: This bunny is just adorable. My niece had a great time bathing it. We don’t have a hair dryer so we put it in the regular dryer for about 5-10 minutes and it came out great.
customer_reviews.author: wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. The box was slightly damaged when it came. Not the best presentation. Cleaning it and drying it was an okay event.my daughter was a little into it. The thing that dried doesn’t look better then what it was before. Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Girls love them!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 and 7 year olds loved washing them (we used a little dish soap) and laying them out in the sun to dry while they played. They dried super cute and we did brush them every hour or so while drying.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: It came out of the packaging looking absolutely pathetic but once it was washed and dried it fluffed right up and is an adorable stuffed animal. My daughter had a great time with this. Much more fun than most “unboxing” toys.
customer_reviews.author: 2muchtime

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not the best .
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, but after you wash and dry the bunny, it really is not fluffy as shown It is flat, granddaughter likes it but is sad that it is fluffy like a stuff bunny.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh good..?
customer_reviews.text: When we washed it the fur became hard so we washed it again and it finally was soft but a lot of fur came out when we brushed it, overall it was adorable but it could be made better in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: Made my baby happy, so it was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Eeehhh, it was as I expected after reading the reviews. My 7 year old really wanted one, so....there you go. The things we buy for our kids are only as good as the happiness they bring, and this made her happy so I'm giving it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: We got what we were looking for and very satisfied for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved it, well packaged and a good price. She was so happy about how soft it is that she sleeps with it. She’s happy I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Garciacano

customer_reviews.title: Very adorable and great for ages up to 12 I would say
customer_reviews.text: Just adorable purchased for a 6 and 8 year old and they loved them. It was so much fun discovering if a girl or boy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not come out looking like the box. Once washed, it took forever to dry. It still looked a hot mess after it dried. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Watson

customer_reviews.title: God Kids LOOVED It
customer_reviews.text: They loved giving their pets baths and drying them off and brushing out the fur. They thought it was so fun
customer_reviews.author: ems

customer_reviews.title: Cute storyline that comes with bunny!!
customer_reviews.text: The back story to this plush is soo cute! My daughter was so into it. I love how my daughters got so into it. Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.author: Cisco n Z

customer_reviews.title: Bunny
customer_reviews.text: These stuffed animals are cute, girls like them. This bunny is adorable. Easy to wash and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t
customer_reviews.text: This toilet definitely don’t recommend that I did it with my four-year-old daughter and all she did was cry because it didn’t turn out how she wanted it what a mess we sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my granddaughter wanted from Santa! And he delivered! Fast service! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bunny Looks Homeless
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved opening this and washing it, but after washing and drying this thing is pretty scruffy looking...
customer_reviews.author: Matulewicz

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Cute concept. You get a little ball of glue. The kids love bathing it and blow drying it to see what they got.
customer_reviews.author: joyce Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it! I got it for her for Easter! I was a little disappointed on how the bunny looked after it was washed but she did not mind at all!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my 10 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.text: She has the other pet and wanted this one, too. She couldn't wait to open the box when it arrived. She loves this one and now wants another. Seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these. Super fun to wash, blow dry and comb out the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: easter disaster
customer_reviews.text: total disappointment to granddaughter.it was a grand mess.I think they put in trash
customer_reviews.author: theresaspradlin

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these little animals and get a kick out of washing and drying them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little bunnies for my granddaughters!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my granddaughters for Easter and they loved them. They were so excited to give them a bath and then dry and fluff. I’m hoping they will cherish them for a very long time. I enjoyed doing this together with them.
customer_reviews.author: fanceegirl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable but must have patience
customer_reviews.text: Both of daughters loves these scruff a loves... we have 3 in our collection now... make sure you shampoo and condition them... blow dry at least 20 mins and brush brush and brush.. the more you brush their fur the softer it gets.. give it some patience and you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophy Ohata

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought his for my niece who is destined to be a vet someday and she absolutely loved it! Such a gun concept and perfect for any little animal lover!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ours turned out awesome 😎 i know it was a ball but by going to the website it turned out good. We lost some hair but other than that awesome
customer_reviews.author: Da Ninja Twinz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fluffy when clean
customer_reviews.text: So the girls loved these but they couldn’t actually play with them until they were in the washer a couple times. Instructions don’t exactly work as planned but once they got them clean they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jo Cox

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Product was a big disappointment. After washing and following direction did not fluff up. Bought two, tried drying one with hairdryer on low and melted it. Don’t waste your money. My one granddaughter was very disappointed with the results. The other granddaughter was not allowed to try drying and looks like an old chewed up dog toy ☹️
customer_reviews.author: stellard@msu.edu

customer_reviews.title: Super fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Really cute gift...and fun to be able to style it
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to dry
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to dry and never really looked good after drying and combing
customer_reviews.author: Ellenp

customer_reviews.title: cute items for little girls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a couple of little girls and they loved them
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Niece approved
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this!! I'm planning on getting her another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Denning

customer_reviews.title: Got to get these scruff a luv pets if you have kids or granbabies!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandbaby an she loves it..sleeps wit it every nit plus I got to play wit it an it's so soft an lovable/cuddly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Bailey

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute can’t pick color or animal
customer_reviews.text: Just know you have no idea what color it is. This particular one is actually a rabbit. But I thought they were all yellow. There were some tears for everyone wanted the blue one!! Cute toy though. Just wish somehow they would put what color it is for us grow ups.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this period I highly recommend this for any child
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cole

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect colour
customer_reviews.text: The item shows as lemon drizzle (lemon), posie (peach) or Peppermint (Mint)?, I received a pink bunny, not what my son would appreciate!! Amazon do not make it easy to ask for the correct replacement! I do have to add, the bunnies are adorable I am just annoyed about the colour description.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughter very hoppy
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to purchase the exact animal we want instead of buying in store and possibly getting another duplicate. This is such a fun way for kids to have good clean fun
customer_reviews.author: Anna Webster

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my niece’s Easter basket and she absolutely loves it! Great price and just as described
customer_reviews.author: iceute

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loved this. The interaction with it she found really exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fun & cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute daughter loved it so much that we ordered another one for a birthday gift of a friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with scuff a loves we have 7 now. Adorable
customer_reviews.author: Payton nation

customer_reviews.title: Not like picture, very small
customer_reviews.text: Been washing that poor bunny but looks like a matter mess
customer_reviews.author: Amber Brickler

customer_reviews.title: Good idea , poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Fun idea. Horrible execution. Poor quality, took forever to dry. Left a weird residue on hands when wet. Once dried after several times in dryer hair was so sticky and matted that we had to throw away. Never got to play with it. Hair fell out when tried to brush it. Like I said, great idea, poor execution= waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Adalin Thiel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter LOVED this, definitely buying more! Great price and she got it in one day, bonus!!
customer_reviews.author: Janus66

customer_reviews.title: Love her
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is very happy with this cute little bunny
customer_reviews.author: krystal

customer_reviews.title: Scary, DO NOT buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It is far the worst toy I purchased for my daughter. She was crying saying that her pink bunny had a beard and it looks scary. No starts for this toy, packaging is the best part of that toy. One star for packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Mahorivskyy

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: TOTALLY not worth the money at all. Looked use from a yard sale or Goodwill
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had so much fun!!! Very cute and adorable
customer_reviews.author: Jesenia

customer_reviews.title: Good idea— poor execution
customer_reviews.text: gifted to my two nieces they didn’t end up being cute and they were hard to comb they were hard to dry.. overall not impressed and really enjoy the idea behind them
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kellum

customer_reviews.title: We Hate It - But Our Daughter Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We are a fan of these toys, HOWEVER our daughter loves them and they do work as described. They aren't overly expensive and we feel the are a decent value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Gross

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time & money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the bunny for my daughters Easter basket. We followed the instructions step by step. Unfortunately the bunny looks like a wet dust mop. I’m extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mystee Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Torn up
customer_reviews.text: Was suppose to be a gift and box was torn to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: MckinneyFam05

customer_reviews.title: Teaches children how to care for something
customer_reviews.text: My little girl wasn’t very interested in it but I thought it was the cutest!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy717

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is an AMAZING cute little stuff animal for girls. I bought it for my granddaughter and she loved the flower ears and the suspense of what color it would be!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She was so excited to wash it. It does take awhile to dry, but she put it in front of a fan to speed it up. But overall cute and fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Gigis

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: My girls really wanted these. They enjoyed them. Took forever for them to dry. Very scruffy looking bunny?
customer_reviews.author: zappathemutt

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Your suppose to be able to “ wash “ them they are lead weights once wet not like the commercial makes them out to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The bunnies are cute and my daughters loved bathing and drying them. I was disappointed one box came with the handle ripped and one bunny didn't have a nose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product box damaged ... can’t give it as a gift in this condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a gift I need for tomorrow and box came completely damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Prado

customer_reviews.title: Ratty Rabbit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandchildren. We followed the directions but they look like some old ratty toy once you wet them and then allow them do dry. I do not recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Honeyjo

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it the first day
customer_reviews.text: It was extremely hard to dry after washing & just not that fun

product_meta.title: Little Live Scruff-A-Luvs - Blossom Bunnies - Limited Edition
product_meta.description: Style:BunnyThese unloved and abandoned pets are in need of your help! The color Blossom bunny you are rescuing is a mystery! Will it be lemon, mint, or Peach? Adopt them all and in return, they will be your FFF, furry friend forever! Each Blossom bunny scruffaluv comes with a brush for grooming, a beautiful flower crown & adoption Certificate. Simply wash, dry, groom, accessorize & live happily ever after!
feature_bullets: Which mystery color Blossom bunny will you rescue; lemon drizzle (lemon), posie (peach) or Peppermint (Mint)?
Wash them, dry them, brush them and watch them transform into a happy little bunny!
Just like real pets, scruff-a-luv love to be washed and groomed. The more time you spend caring for them, the cuter they become.
Each limited edition Blossom bunny scruff-a-luv comes with a brush and a flower crown.
Each scruff-a-luv comes with an Adoption Certificate.
Adopt all 3 Blossom bunnies. Fill out their Adoption Certificate and in return, they will be your FFF, furry friend forever & live happily ever after!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars636 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
